```{r beta-binomial-example, error=TRUE}
library(rstan)
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
bb <- list(x=20, n=100)
bb_fit <- stan(file='beta-binomial.stan', data=bb, iter= 1000, chains = 4)
save(bb_fit, file="bb.RData")
summary(bb_fit)
```
